alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:51PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jasper and northwestern Clarke Counties through 915 PM CST... At 851 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orange, or 12 miles west of Quitman, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Orange around 855 PM CST. Stonewall around 910 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pachuta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for east central Mississippi.
